item.title: Sugarcube
item.description: Sugarcube is a generative art program that creates intricate voxel structures using 3D cellular automata. The program is written in C++ and uses GLFW for creating the window and OpenGL context. The GUI is built using ImGui, an excellent open source project that I can't say enough nice things about. This is the first non-trivial program I wrote while learning OpenGL. You can download the source code here.
